question: The US Congress has recently demanded a probe into the aging Runit Dome as a part of the recently approved defence bill. Where is the Runit Dome located?
explanation: The US Congress has demanded the Department of energy to investigate the concrete dome full of nuclear wastes due to the threat posed by the rising sea levels in the Marshall Islands. The Runit Dome holds tonnes of radioactive wastes from dozens of US atomic bomb tests that were carried out during the Cold War.
